00037 int PlotAmplitude::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00038 
00039   // Loop through and find a fast channel
00040   //  std::cout << "Size of gAnalysedPulseMap " << gAnalysedPulseMap.size() << std::endl;
00041   for (StringAnalPulseMap::iterator detIter = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin(); detIter != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); detIter++) {
00042 
00043     std::string detname = detIter->first;
00044     std::string keyname = detIter->first + GetName();
00045 
00046     // Create the histogram if it's not been created yet
00047     if ( fAmplitudePlots.find(keyname) == fAmplitudePlots.end() ) {
00048 
00049       // hAmplitude
00050       std::string histname = "h" + detname + "_Amplitude";
00051       std::string histtitle = "Plot of the amplitude of pulses in the " + detname + " detector";
00052       int n_bits = gSetup->GetNBits(gSetup->GetBankName(detname));
00053       double max_adc_value = std::pow(2, n_bits);
00054       TH1F* hAmplitude = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), max_adc_value,0,max_adc_value);
00055       hAmplitude->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Amplitude [ADC value]");
00056       hAmplitude->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Arbitrary Unit");
00057       fAmplitudePlots[keyname] = hAmplitude;
00058     }
00059 
00060     AnalysedPulseList pulses = detIter->second;
00061 
00062     for (AnalysedPulseList::iterator pulseIter = pulses.begin(); pulseIter != pulses.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00063       double amplitude = (*pulseIter)->GetAmplitude();
00064       fAmplitudePlots[keyname]->Fill(amplitude);
00065             
00066     } // end loop through pulses
00067           
00068   } // end loop through detectors
00069   return 0;
00070 }

00072 ALCAP_REGISTER_MODULE(PlotAmplitude)
